title: Lombardia Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Macrobiotic, Organic, Western, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A family business since 1972 which started out as a health food store and grew to incorporate a cafe and a line of hot fruit and ginger juices. The organic deli/diner serves a wide range of raw food, gluten-free, veggie, and vegan options. Specials are the California style salads, veggie soups, and vegan dish of the day; try the vegan whipped cream. Seats 80.
